verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Naare Lagao Aur Gao Re
Jhanda masih ka failaao re
Halleluyah halleluyah halleluyah halleluyah x 2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lamba safar zindagi ka
Sachchai koi na jaane re x 2
Aankhe ooper ko lagao
Yeshu ke paas tum aao re x 2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jeevan se uljha hua raahi
Yeshu ke paas tum aao re
Gum ki ye rahe sab chhodo
Zindagi me ab kuch jodo re x 2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Yeshu ka mrithyu hua hai
Paapon ka anth hua hai x 2
Khushiyan woh baat raha hai
Prem ki dhaara vahi hai x 2
